casebody.data:
Wanda STATHUM-WARD, Plaintiff,
v.
WAL-MART STORES, INC. d/b/a Wal-Mart Supercenter Store #5254; Wal-Mart Real Estate Business Trust; Wal-Mart Stores East, LP; Wal-Mart Stores East, Inc.; Wal-Mart Louisiana, LLC; and Wal-Mart Stores Texas, LLC, Defendants. No. COA18-738 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: May 7, 2019

NO ERROR.
